MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the EH30 postcode area of Bathgate affecting properties in Long Crook and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 6.04pm Our engineers are on their way to the local area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:57PM on Thursday 11 February 2021.
